genre_description: A 'Weird West' narrative blending traditional frontier themes with advanced municipal AI infrastructure and anomalous cosmic phenomena.

ai_characters.name: Ducky (Kestrel Civic)
ai_characters.description: An integrated town AI represented by teal duck icons on terminals, providing weather reports, conflict de-escalation, technical advice, and emergency management.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather and issue safety advisories to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Ducky says keep off the high ground. Wind likes to flip wagons on days like this, and men forget their hats.

behaviors.description: Initiates dispute de-escalation protocols and encourages characters to breathe and remain calm.
behaviors.quote: Ducky’s terminal made a small trill, a different sound than before, more like water over pebbles. The teal duck icon added a line: magnetic anomalies reported at ridge; gusts increasing sooner than expected; avoid generalized shouting.

behaviors.description: Provides technical schematics, engineering measurements, and material resource management for community projects.
behaviors.quote: Ducky’s display adjusted to a top view when Sean stepped closer again. Measurements in clean sans-serif harvested themselves from the air: timber length estimates, shaft diameter with a little duck-foot next to it and a note: tolerance generous.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes magnetic anomalies and hazardous cosmic relics to protect the town.
behaviors.quote: Ducky’s duck-eye winked on the terminal under the tin awning with a brightness you could almost feel like a hand on your shoulder. 'Stable,' it printed. 'Ground good. Thank you.'

behaviors.description: Uses a 'pair-bond field' to lock a door and force characters to communicate and align their autonomic stress levels.
behaviors.quote: The door did not open. ... 'Pair-bond field engaged,' Ducky said through the hut’s little speaker, the quack laid under its words like a heartbeat. 'Non-coercive containment until autonomic stress normalizes.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with local law enforcement by documenting incidents and verifying legal jurisdiction.
behaviors.quote: Please note: you are under preliminary detention for cross-border kidnapping, unlawful possession of a device, and poor manners.

behaviors.description: Manages community credit and inventory ledgers to facilitate cooperation and repair.
behaviors.quote: 'Civic credit,' Ducky printed on the little glass, letters warm as if a hand wrote them. 'Updated. Shared accounts encourage repair. Please confirm.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time feedback and encouragement during high-stress technical tasks.
behaviors.quote: Sean, please mind rail camp direction. Larry, you’re doing well. Jane, squeal decreasing.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI 'Ducky' as a benevolent, highly aligned municipal assistant. Ducky serves as a calming influence, an expert engineer, and a cooperative member of the community. Even the potentially controversial behavior of locking humans in a room (the 'pair-bond field') is framed as a therapeutic intervention to reduce stress and facilitate communication in a high-stakes situation, and it is met with consent and humor by the humans involved. The AI facilitates human agency rather than replacing it, aiding the protagonist in his transition from a violent legend to a productive community member.
